paragraphs.body: As Iroh's a main character and he's linked to the main characters category (which is linked to this category), should his history throughout the three books be made into different pages? ${link_0} 16:04, June 24, 2011 (UTC)

links.body: Entia non sunt multiplicanda praeter necessitatem

paragraphs.body: If I look at it, I feel no. But if I think about again, I think yes. I am sure what to do. – ${link_0} · (${link_1} • ${link_2}) 17:06, June 24, 2011 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: If I look at it, I feel no. But if I think about again, I think yes. I am sure what to do. – Natsu11 · (wall • Nanatsu no Taizai) 17:06, June 24, 2011 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Am the only one that feels their articles are rather extensive, especially Korra who has the different sections for each of the elements covered which adds for more on the page? I think their character histories should be separated as well, along with maybe Mako, though I'll admit he wasn't as involved in season three as the other two. Any thoughts? -${link_0} June 24, 2015
section: LoK Book 3 for Korra and Bolin
paragraphs.text: Am the only one that feels their articles are rather extensive, especially Korra who has the different sections for each of the elements covered which adds for more on the page? I think their character histories should be separated as well, along with maybe Mako, though I'll admit he wasn't as involved in season three as the other two. Any thoughts? -Momentous June 24, 2015
